title: A Treasury of Fantasy
description: 1981, hardcover edition, Crown / Avenel, NY. Attractive omnibus edition, 504 pages, featuring heroic adventures in imaginary lands. 46 exceptional b&w illustrations. Wonderful illustrators Aubrey Beardsley, Arthur Hughes, Richard Doyle, and others. The stories here include the writing John Ruskin, George MacDonald, William Morris, Lord Dunsany, H.P. Lovecraft, Robert E. Howard, Ursula K. Le Guin, and others. Very nicely done.
author: Cary Wilkins
